The quality of the scans I have done is great - no complaints whatsoever.

All in all, a great little scanner. Highly recommended!

Very easy to use. Excellent feed ing mechanisms.  So far not 1 jam.  Scan quality is excellent for black white document.   Good for photo.   Software is useful and smooth.   Scanner is small and easy to plug in when use and take out and hide it when not in use.    Only 2 cons. 1) software is bit hard to install. Slow brother website??    2) photo scannering image is bit dark in shadow area. Color correction setting is not enough.

[This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I received this product for free from Brother in exchange for my honest opinion/review of the product. I thought that this was an awesome product. It is super compact and lightweight so I can literally throw it inside my bag and go! It is extremely easy to use once you get it downloaded properly. I have to be honest in saying that im I thought I would be able to use it from my mobile device but I realized that there is a different mobile that you have to have to use the app. But all in all is very convenient loose to using a large scanner and having to make sure it is slight to scan properly. I love how this product can easily adjust to the document size whether it`s a card or a full sheet of paper and it aligns perfect so no need to rescan! I find this item very helpful for scanning invoice for my business so I can stay more organized and the best thing is I can take it everywhere with me!!!

I scanned about 50 to a 100 documents and receipts one afternoon and everything worked fine... until it didn't. I tried everything to get it working (I used to be CompTIA A+ certified, so I am pretty privvy to troubleshooting hardware and software issues). I tried unplugging it for a while, opening the scanner to remove anything that was stuck and to clean it, re-installing the drivers, re-loading the scanner settings in the software, etc... the image would be 100% black on every scan thereafter.

Then I put it in a pocket in my backpack which houses many other electronics and cords for those electronics. The cord to this scanner is very cheaply made and melted all over the place. I had to wipe the gunk off of all the other things in that pocket. Luckily it was only stuff I could clean in there, but it did ruin a large pocket in my backpack, and now I need to buy a new scanner and a new backpack...

This is my first purchase of portable scanner.  It's a one side  scanner and you get what you paid for. I am happy with this scanner. I went to brother website and after registering the scanner, I downloaded  the pdf document software and Paperport pdf management program and the receipt scanning software.  The USB 3 cable for the scanner is 35 inches long, almost 3 feet.

This worked right out of the box and does exactly what I need it to do. I love the size and weight and the case I purchased for it fits nicely into my bag. I wish it would scan the docs to the same pdf rather than requiring me to combine them once they are all scanned but it's not a big deal considering how easy everything else has been with this.

[This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I gave this a five star once I finally got it to work. If I'd spent anymore time trying it would have been a 1. The instructions are not clear, the link that is shown on the instructions takes you to an 404 error code. I finally googled the product and located the software on Brother's website. Although it never asked for a serial number, twice it told me my product had either already been installed, or didn't exist. I didn;t give up and found the software, installed it, and clicked "scan". HOLY COW, this thing is awesome! So glad I didn't give up, I've only used it for a full page scan, but see that it scans receipts and other items. I have seen similar scanners at the Dr office and maybe this is what they used. Super compact, easily stored near your computer or laptop. I plan to use with a laptop so I don't have to go to my desktop printer/scanner. Quality looks great and is super fast.
Once again, if you get one, don't give up, The overall result is worth it!!

I would highly recommend not getting this portable scanner. The concept, structure and price of the scanner are all great, and when it works it works well. I've purchased two of these scanners (returned the first due to the same issues) in hopes of having luck and to no avail. The scanner drivers and software install with no problems, and it will remain online until I scan a single page. The machine disconnects from my computer after ever page it scans. First one did as well. I have to leave the device unplugged for about an hour, plug it back in, then reinstall the machine to my laptop in order to scan another single piece of paper. It doesn't make scanning calculus homework (the primary reason for purchase) a fun time. I have never had such a fiasco with a simple piece of machinery, and I intend on returning this yet again and getting a different brand of scanner. I'm happy for all the ones that work for people, but I am incredibly dissatisfied with this product.

I was told when I purchased your product that it would connect to my Lenix based computer.  I have not been able to get the software to download.  This is the second scanner I have purchased that will not connect.  I am having my computer looked at to ensure it is not a problem with the computer

Piece of junk - avoid at all costs!

simply does not work as advertised. Keeps adding tons of white spae to photos, big time issues even trying to get the feeder to work so i can scan, software written in the 70's alll around bottom of the barrel product just like everything Brother makes.

Scanner works well, took one star off because image quality has room for improvement. Also due to the units very small size you have to carefully load the papers through you can't just drop a pile of documents or rush the paper through. Scans will come out crooked if you don't take care.

I'm doing a major project,  scanning 25 years of photographs.  This is perfect for a low cost scanner.  Good quality photo scans even though this is now of a document scanner.  I couldn't afford a photo scanner that would feed in ac stack of photos but for under $100 this is perfect.

I purchased this for my son during school shut downs since he had to constantly submit his work. He Absolutely loved this item and stopped him from having to get up and use the family printer to scan things from his room.
Scanning Quality is great and super easy to set up and use.

Bought for side work. Same day i bought some cords for my computer i thought i needed but they Sold me the wrong ones. I misplaced my receipt and would like to return for store credit. I paid with my debit card. Please let me know how to handle. 

Curbside pick up was great.

[This review was collected as part of a promotion.] It's a nice little unit. The SW set up was a little buggy but hey, it's SW. Not a deal breaker.

Simple to use and I love the small footprint. It disappears behind my monitor and I grab it for use and tuck it back in when done.

In all, I would recommend to a friend.

Works great for what I  need. Plugs into my laptop and alows me to scan finciial documents so I  
don't have a bunch of paper files to deal with. I can search by keyword if I  get filing categories mixed up.  This also allows me to email scanned documents when needed.

Not worth it, I got this to help me scan my documents for classes and save them to my laptop. There are so many steps and procedures to go through and even after downloading all the necessary things, it still was VERY complicated to use and properly scan documents.

The scanner works really good, not sure of can actually scan at 16 pages per minute. This is due to the iprint and scan software that asks multiple questions to scan additional pages. The DS-620. Had great software.
All in sll is is nice portable scanner.

Scanning documents and OCR works fine on MacOS. Software is easy to use for just pure scanning and saving pdf. Very simplistic but perfect for my needs. This scanner only takes documents with a few pages at most so no scanning of magazines or books, etc.

I purchased this scanner for my son, an engineering student. During COVID-19 related move to online classes only, this scanner has saved him a tremendous amount of time for submitting homework and tests. He loves it and highly recommends it.

By far the best $90 I've ever spent.  My flatdeck scanner was always such a pain to use - this little guy is fast, I can control exactly where the scanned page goes and in what format, and I can add additional pages easily.  I love it!

Of all the scanners I have used this is one of the worst I have ever used. Quality is below what I expected from Brother. I was unable to get a decent scan after several tries. Not built to Brothers standard as far as I was concerned.

It took me maybe an hour to figure it out how to install the device,once I was able to set it up right,its easier to use and operate,so far it does the work and it will be easy for me to bring the device anywhere as the size permits.

I originally purchased another brand and it would not stay connected.  I installed this one and it has performed beautifully!  I have been working from home and scan nearly every day.  I am really happy and highly recommend it!

This scanner is AMAZING. It is quick, easy to install, able to do multiple pages one at a time but is so quick to add pages on. I am very impressed. No more clicking pictures to scan from my phone. Fits beautifully on my desk.

For the price, this is a good and reliable scanner. You do need to regularly clean the scanner glass area before, during, and after each use or your scanned image will have a vertical stripe or stripes running through it.

We bought this for our daughter to take to college, super easy to use and set up. Scan quality is amazing for such a small unit. Wish it had the carry sleeve with it like our first one did, otherwise we’ll worth the money

I was originally hesitant on getting this because I wanted something that would be good for photos. This is amazing for photos! I had to quarantine and decided to scan all my families old photos. It did it amazingly!

I had received this document and photo scanner for a gift and was very well pleased with the performance of this little scanner. I have limited space, so having a bulky scanner was just not an option for me. The size is quite easy to store in small places. The hardware was fairly easy to access online and set up. I have uploaded several family photos and will eventually upload to the cloud so my whole family can share all our old family photos. If your into ancestry, this will be a useful tool as well to upload those documents and old photos to your accounts to share your historical documents with relations from around the world. I have lots of plans for this great scanner. Archiving my artwork, scanning family cookbook recipes....the ideas and projects are endless. I can't wait! I still have to learn to tweak a few things to my liking and wish that after I scanned photos they would display the icon of the image itself so I can more easily separate the documents, but it may be something I can figure out how to remedy with a little research online. Overall, great product!

As advertised. A simple to use compact scanner that captures paper documents and images with accuracy that I would expect or a bit better from a device of this size and price point. Worthy of your consideration.

Simple setup and easy to use. Small footprint on the desk or near the physical computer. The usb cable should be longer as to not limit the location of the scanner in relation to the computer. Good price point.
This scanner is perfect for my home office where I just need to do occasional scanning. Quality is decent and doesn’t take up much room. Took a little to set up on my Mac, but now everything is good.
So easy to use for quick scans of credit cards, ID cards, one-sided sheets.  No need to drag out my bulky multipurpose all-in-one.  It produces clear images and is compatible with Windows 10 and 11.
Great product, wont scan automatically on anything higher than 300 dpi. But will go up to 1200 dpi manually selecting paper size. Was able to scan thousands of pictures into digital in short times
I love this easy to install and use document scanner. I have a scanner on my printer and it has never consistently worked. So I bought this portable scanner and wish I had bought it sooner.
Bought this to scan documents and receipts for a house my wife and I are building. Works great! The only thing it can’t do is feed multiple documents at a time so it can be time consuming.
Due to the new learning environment, this was the perfect add-on for my child's Surface computer to send in school work that was hand created.  It is small, portable, and very easy to use.
easy to use and portable; scanning does take about 1 minute longer than expected as you have to click on the app in computer instead of pressing the button on scanner to initiate scanning
I am very impressed with the speed and quality of this scanner, I have been using an HP scanner which took too long to produce a scan. Very glad that the Brother DS640 became available.
I got this scanner to digitize work documents at home while not being able to go in to the office to use the big scanner. It's come in really handy for digitizing important mail, too.
Great little scanner. This scanner takes up very little space and since I only need to scan a few single pages every month it works perfectly for my needs. Easy to set up and use.
Every time I need at least an hour to be messing with the scanner for it to actually connect. No matter what I do it does not connect and it makes it complicated to scan anything.
This scanner looked like exactly what I was looking for however I’ll never know as I didn’t even open it up. I returned it because my tax advisor suggested using something else.

[This review was collected as part of a promotion.] The Brother - DS-640 Compact Mobile Scanner allows you to scan paperwork at home and on the go using a USB Cable. I tested the scanner using a desktop by plugging in the USB 3.0 cable into my computer. The box includes a, ": Quick Setup Guide", USB 3.0 (Micro USB Cable), Calibration Sheet, and Warranty Card. You are able to view a detailed instruction guide on support.brother.com/manuals. I used internet explorer to view the manual, as Chrome for some reason didn't work for me. 

This particular scanner scans one-page documents at a time. Images were clear and readable that were scanned. Scanned receipts, bills, pictures, and personal information. I included a scanned image of the registry for you to see. Be sure to line the page up properly for an even scan. I scanned in a recent memorial program for a loved it and the pictures showed up clearly. 

Please note that it is recommended to use a calibration sheet to scan certain documents which may include and are not limited to (items that are written in pencil, photographs, damaged documents, etc). The calibration sheet must be purchased separately. 

Pros:
Portable
Can scan documents, images, and cards

Cons:
Would like it a cellphone option (but know there is an upgraded version of this one)
SD Card Slot

[This review was collected as part of a promotion.] We already have a flatbed scanner, “have owned many over the years” but have never had a portable one. I happen to see Brother had some new models come out so decided to give this a try as it would be nice to be able to have the scanner on the desk with the computer/laptop instead of going into another room to scan documents, and one to take with us on business trips.

Unboxing:
The scanner itself is considerably smaller than the box it came in. At first when I saw the box I was wondering just how large this “portable scanner” would be. To our relief it didn’t take up much room at all in the display box. Inside the scanner was well cradled in a cardboard frame and included a USB cable, guides and that’s it.

Setting up:
Setting up the device was pretty simple, just plug the USB cable into the right side of the unit and plug the other end of the cable into an open USB 3 port. The cable isn’t that long and do wish it was longer, another foot or two would have made it easier to move around the desk. With the USB port being on the right side you have to figure out placement so either a longer cable or putting the port on the back may have been better “nothing major to complain about though”.

The software install was pretty straight forward, just go to the Brother website and download the installation package. You will have to register your device and use the included code on the bottom of the unit to register a couple of them though.

Using:
This compact scanner came with plenty of applications to get your scanning jobs done. You have software that you can scan and store your receipts “Br Receipts”, business card software “Presto BizCard” , regular scanning software “Brother I Print and Scan” and a nice PDF editor “Kofax Power PDF”. Using the Power PDF software was really straight forward and is really fully featured. If you do a lot of PDF work you will really appreciate it.

I also have been using the Presto BizCard software and we really like it. It scans a business card in just about 2 seconds and so far has read all the information on the cards correctly. It organized all of them in an electronic rolodex and makes looking up information a snap.

I’ve also tried scanning some photos, “our other scanners did that pretty good, most not that great” but I was floored just how good this one scanned some color photos. The colors on screen really matched up well with the scanned photos and when printing them out they came out very close to the original. We’ll be using this little scanner to go through all our old photos and get them scanned in. The big plus is it’s faster and more convenient to use for that as all you have to do is feed them into the slot. No messing around with covers and making sure the photos are centered or squared on the flatbed scanner.

If you are looking for a compact / portable scanner I’d take a serious look at this new little Brother DS-640. It’s not very expensive and its performance is better than our other flatbed scanners, plus it’s more convenient. This one is a very basic portable scanner; it doesn’t come with all the bells and whistles. But if you need a scanner that’s more portable, has external storage or wireless connection abilities then you may want to get of the more advanced “and higher priced” models offered by Brother.

[This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Great little scanner - easily scans all items up to LTR width and below. Scans effectively and quickly with good consistent results. Each full-page scan took about 3seconds

The scanner has no loose parts except for standard USB cable. Easily fits into any carry bag for easy portability.

Software included does help with file organization and is quite user friendly. Each scan can set to a template where it automatically pulls the Vendor/date/pay type/tax/amount

Overall a great addition to my home office vs my Brother Laser printer/scanner. I only knocked down 1 star as there is no way to load multiple pages to be consecutively scanned. Each item/page has to be done manually.

[This review was collected as part of a promotion.] My new DS=640 is thin and light. Fits perfectly in my laptop carrying case. with the included software, scanning papers, receipts what have you, is simple and fast.

The scanner driver is easy to download from Bother's website. After the installation, it includes scanning and filing software, Nuance's Paperport 14- Light.

I wasn't able to test the BR-Receipt software at this time.

I really like the ability to open the scanner and clear a jam or clean out the feed mechanism. I found this a flaw in some other portable scanners.

The scanner holds onto the sheet being fed so you can use the scan software to feed the next page. 

The scans were clear and ready to file or be converted by most OCR software, straight into WORD. Great time saver.

I just love my new on the go scanner. No battery runs off the usb port and turns off if not used for a g=few minutes saving my laptop's BATTERY.

[This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I was excited to try the Brother - DS-640 Compact Mobile Scanner but the only problem was I couldn't get it to connect to any device. Mac and Windows! Nothing would recognize the scanner. The whole trying to set this device up really caused a headache and still it is unusable.

[This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Brother's DS-640 is a mobile scanner because it is compact - about the size of a rectangular-ized paper towel roll. It feels solid and well-built - not at all fragile.

The scanner recognizes documents as soon as they are inserted and processes them almost without flaw - uncharacteristically well for something other than a flatbed scanner (or the equivalent in a home office printer). It made no mistakes deciding how to process everything I fed into it (color, black-and-white, gray scale).

For a scanner this size, it gets five stars without even so much as a moment of hesitation. And, technically, this review is designed to address the hardware.

But all hardware requires drivers and software to be useful. And I had a little bit of trouble getting the driver to recognize the hardware - how is that even possible in 2020? And though packaged pdf software is fairly nice, it's only a 15 day trial. And I don't appreciate it when packaged software for basic functionality requires an up-charge. 

I included copies of my first test scan - Brother's Limited Warranty for this product - and the first page of the corresponding OCR (not bad).

For a scanning device that looks more like a wand than a legitimate scanner, this is a very impressive piece of hardware. Surely Brother will have a better driver in time - and you should probably plan to pair this device with your own software.

[This review was collected as part of a promotion.] There is one thing you're going to notice about this scanner, it is very small and extremely light. This scanner is well made, it is white with black accent and it looks very nice. On the upper right corner has the start/stop button and a power indicator light. It is very simple to use, just plug it to any laptop running Windows or Mac OS, get the drivers and you're good to go. One thing I did have to do was to download the actual drivers, plugging it in and did not do the job right out the box and this was on Windows 10. In the driver installation package you get the brothers iPrint software which is easy to use. The quality of the scanned images were excellent even in color. 

The scanner has a small leveler which you use to adjust the paper size up to 4A (11.5), and it also scans IDs, credit cards and business cards. You can only feed one paper at a time but it is pretty cool how the device locks the paper in place once it detects it on the feeder and it scans pretty fast. This is designed for the traveler and people who work on the go, again this device is very light, compact and simple to use. However, there are some downsides, one of them being that it needs to be plugged into a laptop for it to work. Also this scanner does not have a built in battery, WiFi or Bluetooth connectivity.

Overall if you don't mind having to plug this to a laptop and scan one page at a time this will definitely get the job done and is very portable. This scanner will work with Windows, Mac and even Linux. I tried it with Chrome OS but it didn't work. In the box it comes with the scanner USB3 cable and manuals. 

Pros:
Light weight 
Portability 
Simplicity 
Scanned Images
Design and Built quality

Cons: 
Must be plugging to Laptop 
No WiFi
No Bluetooth
No built in battery
One Page scanning

[This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Great for at-home quick scanning of documents, receipts, pictures. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Brother DS-640 Compact Mobile Document Scanner 
Brother’s printer and scanner products never disappoint me. They seem to outlast my other equipment and work reliably. And, so again, I’m enjoying a portable scanner that was up and running only minutes after plugging it in and installing some software. No excuses, no problems. 

SETUP/INSTALL: Download the software. There are a couple of choices, and either works fine. There was a firmware update available, and that took moments to install, too. Plug in the printer and open the APP. You can select your Resolution (up to 600 x 600), File Type, color or B&W, size, and destination. Under advanced settings you can change brightness and contrast. Scanning is initiated from the App. Place the to-be-printed photo, paper, sketch into the front slot of the scanner, and initiate scanning from the APP. There is no auto-document feeder. While the scan is accomplished the image pops up in the App on your screen. 

PERFORMANCE: The scans are colorful, detailed and fast. Your selection of file type will determine what you will use to edit or enhance your scans (I use either Photo or Photoshop Elements --- NOT included). It’s all very straight forward. It’s hard to find fault with the scanner at all. It just works. 

I will remind other buyers that you should be sure you want a manual scanner. Brother has an autofeed version. It also has scanners that work with mobile devices. This model is intended to plug into the USB port of your laptop/desktop. I scan old photos and my grandkids artwork. I don’t care about auto-feed. My only “wish for” is that a nice carry case be included in the box. These wonderfully portable devices are not so portable if there is no protective carry case/shell/bag. 

But, I still like it a lot. It's easy to recommend Brother’s DS-640 scanner.

[This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Opening the box, it contained the mobile scanner, MicroUSB 3.0 cable and a quick start guide. The guide instructed me to go to the Brother software support download page and download the full install pack for the scanner. I had to do a search for the model number and then it was a quick download. 

I started the software and on step 3 or 4 it couldn't find the unit. I tried a few times, turning the unit off/on or checking the cable. Nothing worked. I was using a front panel USB port and I don't have any available in the rear, so I figured try one of the two on my Seagate external drive. Tada, the software skipped searching for the scanner and immediately saw it. That was the only hiccup I ran into. It breezed through the rest of the install and it was time to test it out. I ran a page of my bank statement through the scanner and the scan quality was very good. I like the software and the small pop up it generated. All it took was to insert the statement and hit the start/stop button easily found on the top of the unit. It took a number of seconds and then it did a fast scan. The pop up stated it was done and had a button to click if I wanted to open the file that it was saved in. Nice feature as some users get lost and don't know where they saved the file.

There are codes for Nuance Power PDF (Windows and OsX) on the bottom of the scanner.You can download the software on the same page as the full install. It installs very quickly and easily.

Oh, you can scan a number of sizes up to an A4. There's a movable guide on the feed with markings for A4, B5, A5, A6, and a symbol that looks like envelope (I'll have to check it out in the manual). The unit is very portable, 11.5 inches wide by 1 inch tall and 2 inches deep. It weighs under 1.5 lbs according to the box. I don't think it's that much, but it is hefty enough that it doesn't feel like it's not going to stay put. Overall a great portable scanning unit.

[This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Brother - DS-640 Compact Mobile Scanner - White

The Brother scanner DS-640 is a mobile, stand alone scanner. It is powered by the USB-3 cable and requires no additional power. The software installation is all done online, so you will have to have an internet connection to get the scanner software. Additional software is also included but that also requires internet access and there are a few hoops to just through to get the additional software installed and working. It is my honest opinion that the brother software works the best and is easiest to use. I found the PDF and Organizing software to be overkill for a portable scanner that does a good job but will not replace your full size scanner. I scanned black and while pages as well as photographs. It seems the scanner is scanning everything as a .jpg and then the software converts it to what ever you decide. There is a Start button on the scanner and for documents you can just use that. When scanning photos, you’ll want to use the brother iPrint&Scan software that gets installed. There are setting for just about everything you would want to do. All scans were legible and in focus. The documents show jpg artifacts in the background unless you use the software do a background removal on them. The document is then cleaner, but some fine edges are missing. The additional PDF software is just a replacement for Adobe Acrobat. Since it’s included and is a full suite, with edit capabilities, it makes sense to use it if you don’t have a full version of Acrobat.

I like the size and the fact that because it’s powered by USB it can be ready when you need it, no waiting for a battery to charge. All in all, it is a good portable scanner with descent software included (even if you have to do a little hoop jumping to get it installed). At no point did the instructions fail to make sense. The instructions are few, but the software allows you to follow along and get everything set up.

When first used I did not get acceptable scans. It comes with a calibration sheet, so I followed the instructions and used it. That cleared up the image issues. From that point on it worked fine.

It will be placed in my laptop bag so I can scan things while on the road.

[This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This might be one of the best tech products that I will get this year. Not only is it a quality scanner that scans in both color and black/white, its light, portable and comes with very functional software to make it even more of a necessity for the laptop bag. Weighing in at 1.029 lbs., it is only 1.99" x 11.85" x 1.45" in size which makes it a perfect mobile scanner. It is powered by a laptop (or desktop) computer using the micro USB 3.0 cable that comes in the box. 

The DS-640 can scan many types of documents from plain paper, photos, receipts, business cards and even plastic/laminated cards, and that also includes embossed laminated cards. It can scan at a speed up to 16 ppm and is capable of scanning documents as single pages or multi-pages and provides the option of either saving the scanned document in a Secure PDF, Searchable PDF, or PDF/A format. The scanner is designed to work with the operating systems of Windows, Mac OS and Linux.

Being compact and light certainly makes the DS-640 mobile. But Brother must realize that mobile isn’t all there is to making a product be useful, necessary and integral to a person’s lifestyle. The software that is included with the DS-640 is the other part of this procurement that makes it all so important for me. The software allows for scanning to various destinations including File, Image, OCR, Email and various cloud services. I can also just scan it to my laptop’s hard drive or external drive. No longer do I have to schedule a part of my week just to input scanned receipts, I can now scan them easily on the go. Other great features of the included document management and OCR software is that this software allows me to turn any of my hard copy documents into editable Microsoft Word files. The scanner will accommodate 72” long documents that are up to 72 lbs. in bond weight. The document and OCR software and the ability to scan so many types of media make this very useful for me in my daily work of making flyer’s and posting sales ads. It is a real time saver. The Brother Receipt Software that works great with this product is also a great time saver as I am sure I will appreciate it even more come tax time when it is all compiled for me and in Quicken which I purchased separately.

If you are looking for a very nice mobile scanner, or even if you are just tired of keeping up with receipts for your business or work, you owe it to yourself to check out the DS mobile scanners by Brother. This is their compact mobile scanner, but there are a couple of other models that you might want to compare with this one before purchasing. I love my little scanner. The compact size and light weight are awesome! It is just a great and welcomed tech accessory to have.

[This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I tend to prefer Brother over most other brands because the products are generally of higher quality but not higher price. I also like the software that accompanies Brother products because it is easy to use. This scanner meets all of these expectations, but lacks in one area in the ease-of-use.

This is not a "bells and whistles" scanner. It allows you to scan one page at a time (no feeder), and it must be connected via USB to your device. The software makes it relatively easy to scan a multi-page document by adding additional pages to the job until you are ready to save it, but each page must be loaded and the button pressed. Depending on your usage needs, this may not be a big issue.

Brother is assuming a certain amount of familiarity with setting up a device like this one, as there is a brief set-up document included in the box, but that's it. There is no software CD, so everything must be downloaded from their website. This is normal today, but if you are not familiar with Brother's website, it may take you a few minutes to find exactly what software you need.

Once installed, the software is SUPER easy to use. So is the scanner once you figure it out. It took me a few minutes to figure out that the paper sensor is on the left side of the scanner, and the fact that if you get it just right (it's a little finicky), it will "grab" the page just enough to load it. Hit the button and it quickly scans the page. It is quick for a scanner of this size, so very happy there.

The quality is great. Text is clear and readable. The colors, at least in default settings, are not perfectly accurate, but for documents, this shouldn't be much of an issue in most cases. This is NOT a photo scanner, but I scanned a couple of properly-exposed photos, and they looked good. Not great, but certainly shareable. They were a little over-exposed in the scan, but I probably could have tweaked the settings a few times to improve the exposure and color.

The issue I had with this scanner was obtaining the software BR-Receipts, which is offered in a separate flyer inside the box. The website refused to recognize the Serial # of my product, and I had to go through a lot of back-and-forth to try to obtain the download.

The BR-Receipts software is very similar to other programs I have used. It allows you to create a folder structure to organize your receipts, and it does its best to read data directly from the receipts. Unfortunately, I had to give the program a lot of assistance in detecting where the key data was located (store name, date, amount, sales tax). For each receipt, you have the opportunity to verify (and correct if necessary) the data from the receipt. I am guessing that after scanning a few receipts from the same retailer, it would eventually figure out the receipt layout, but for the first couple I tried, I had to help it almost every time. There is also a field for "Comments". This is VERY useful to enter specifics about the purchase, as the software includes a search feature that worked very well. This is especially useful if you scan receipts for key purchases (electronics, appliances, etc) that you may need to recover the receipt at a later date, maybe for warranty purposes. You can also run reports based on the data from the receipts, and export it to several file types, including PDF, CSV, QIF for Quicken, and QuickBooks (including IIF). 

Overall, BR-Receipts is great addition to this scanner, but at least initially, it is not a very quick process, so be prepared if you have piles and piles of receipts. Also be prepared to figure the software out on your own, as I could not find any kind of tutorial. Again, Brother software tends to be easier than most, but the help is limited.

As for the scanner, if you have small scan jobs, or are in need or a portable scanner to take with you, this is a great option, as it's affordable and easy to use. Recommended!

Based on older versions which work great, I bought this one as a gift.
DS640 - Great portable scanner! Quick, quiet, and smooth scanning.
This scanner is very small and does everything you need it to do.
Compact & portable. Didn't seem to come with the driver but I googled it and was able to download/install easily; add the device through control panel etc. Works like a charm!
I received this product as a gift but found it almost impossible to use. The user manual online was useless, and a single sheet of paper kept jamming. I returned the product.
The product is simple and easy to use. Scans are quite good, and the space taken up by the scanner is minimal. It is what I wanted when I ordered the scanner. Good Product!!!
Fine Product, goes where I want, allows me to record time-sensitive tax documents before the ink fades. Hooks up to my laptop with no trouble. Online service outstanding.
Needed a small scanner for receipts and other than expenses for my small business. This scanner has worked great for me.. no problems! Love it and would recommend!
I purchased this scanner to scan receipts.  I have two other scanners but this one is the easiest and fasted for scanning receipts.  Quality images very quickly.

Nice little unit for the occasional uses I have. Nice scanning quality.

I would like to know how to accommodate the uncommon connector on the unit, if need be.
This is a great little scanner.  Easy to use.  Scans very fast.  Light weight and portable.  Scans as well as a full size scanner/printer without the hassle.
Originally purchased this item thinking it would work wit my chrome book but it did not, had to return and get a different model. Check before you putchase
this little thing is fantastic. Have already uploaded over 1000 pictures to my pc to place on a memory card . have already recommended this to my friend
I used this scanner at work as well as home.  Scan all incoming mail/documents I want to keep & put in folders on computer for accounting/tax purposes.
The scanner was broken (not physically, but its functionality impaired).  I wish Brother had a quality control system in their production line.
works great! our bigger scanner at work was down, really easy to use. perfect for a couple of pages of scanning or in case of an emergency.
Was looking for a inexpensive scanner to sit by my computer.  This fills the need well.   Works well and with a few minor issues works well
I like the compactness. Drawing power from the 1 connection to the computer makes things simpler and more efficient. Image quality is good.
great portable scanner with excellent quality. very quick scanning. I often have to scan documents on the go and it's the perfect solution
I have this scanner at work and home and i love it. I have been scanning family pictures for my family history and they urn out amazing.
[This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Works fine. Does what I expected. The software is easy enough to find on the Brother website, and I could use it on both my PC and Mac.
This is very easy to use, and has a very small foot print.  I had it up and running in 2 minutes.  The scan quality is quite nice to.

[This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This is one of the best handy and portable scanners in the world. Setup is quite easy and simple. 
It takes about 4-5 seconds for a page to be scanned. It is vey handy and can scan small items like drivers license. 

The best part is that it works with a simple and straightforward USB connection to a laptop. I ran a page of my bank statement through the scanner and the scan quality was very good. I like the software and the small pop up it generated. All it took was to insert the statement and hit the start/stop button easily found on the top of the unit. It took a number of seconds and then it did a fast scan. The pop up stated it was done and had a button to click if I wanted to open the file that it was saved in. Allows setup of multiple workflows for one-click scanning in a variety of formats - text, pdf, jpeg, etc.

There's a movable guide on the feed with markings for A4, B5, A5, A6, and a symbol that looks like envelope (I'll have to check it out in the manual). The unit is very portable, 11.5 inches wide by 1 inch tall and 2 inches deep. It weighs under 1.5 lbs according to the box.

I would definitely recommend this product to anyone.
The only reason I like this scanner is its independency on external. So I just throw in my backpack and I am ready to go. Kudos!
I thought it would be a good idea. Brother doesn't have any updated drivers for new Apple products. Therefore, it does not work.
Great scanner with my mac. Makes uploading receipts for expense reports so easy. Saves so much time! Compact and easy to travel.
Nice scanner, wish I would have spent a little extra though and got the wireless one, kind of a hassle plugging and unplugging

Fast one page scanner.
Good for photo scanning.
Also good for document scanning for few pages. 
Not good for commercial use.
It's unqiue, elegant and simple. Looks great in my bedroom and runs quiet in the background when I sleep. You can use the app to schedule the unit. It's perfect.
The JS FLO Air Purifier works outstanding. The different power settings make it a great choice for many room sizes and the night light is an added bonus too.
I love this thing! Like others said, this does a great job if you have pets. I like the lights built in, but they should make it so it can change colors!
Unit arrived very fast, set up was easy, you just remove the filter bag and plug it in. Look very stylish as well, my mom really likes it.
This is just gorgeous and cute. You can feel the difference within 30 minutes. honestly cannot stop recommending this to my friends.
Small compact but cute looking. Was able to squeeze it in between the coffee table and the bed. So far working like a charm.
Year 2 and running. Air purifier still running strong. I keep in on 24/7, and it really helps with the indoor air quality.
Well i red the manual, plug it in the wall at the proper place. And boom! It started! Its running nonstop now. Love this.
Wonderful speedy service, excellent customer understanding about issue that happened, Unit works great. Thank you John
A well designed air purifier that can hold it's place as part of the living room decor. Very happy with the purchase.
It works well to reduce the allergens in the air. I've definitely noticed a different before and after having one.
My 11 year old is prone to allergies so I got this for her room. She likes it and it does appear to clean the air.
Purchased for my studio. Set up quickly. I can tell the difference. I would recommend. I may purchase another.
Quiet and effective. Noticed the improvement in air quality within 12 hours of use. Very happy with purchase!
The best, just simply the best. Quiet and totally eliminate all odor, leaving a natural scent in the room.
I love my FLO. hands down my favorite purchase of 2019 so far. You can feel the difference 30 mins in!
Haven’t connected to wifi yet, so not sure what I am getting in features other then the 3 fan speeds.
Using this in the kitchen helps with the smell as well as prevent the smoke alarm from being set off.
Very nice air purifier... works great! Love the functionality and size. We use it 24/7.

So far so good! My boyfriend and I are both smokers. We try and stay in our room with it to avoid the smell throughout the rest of the house. This obviously makes our room smell. I've had this going for about 18 hours straight and in that time I've noticed the smell decrease a little bit, but the actual smoke disappears within minutes. I keep it on my nightstand next to my side of the bed. My mother, who is asthmatic came over and usually she can't come into my room because of the smoke. She complemented this air purifier and said it's a lot easier for her to breath in there.   I did not expect the smell itself to go away completely, I just wanted a reduction in smoke and it's working great! I plan to change my filter more often than it says it's needed. It's a little bit bigger than I expected (it takes up about 1/3 of my nightstand) but in my opinion as long as it works I'm good! I plan on buying on to put it diagonally on the other side of the room because my room is larger than the space that is recommended in the information book. It came with very easy directions and is very easy to put the filter in and gives instructions on how the buttons work. Yes it comes with a filter as well.
Product works as advertised, no real complaints.

I suffer terribly from seasonal allergies. Spring/ Summer is not a welcome season for me unless I drug up every day with pills and nose sprays. I wanted to find a better way, so I bought one of these units. Then I bought another, then another and then another. I keep one in my bedroom, and it's a miracle (praise the lord) I can sleep all night without any breathing problems waking me up all night. I keep one in my home office, and no longer go though a box of Cleanex every week. Then there's the one in the living room and one in the kitchen. As long as I stay in the house I'm a free man (hallaluha). It's not a perfect solution, but it's a whole lot better than my previous existence. One of the four air filter starting making a little noise the other day (did I mention they are very quiet, and will actually lull you to sleep with their soft whisper), I emailed the company with my complaint and with no hassle at all they are sending me a new unit. These things are fairly small and stylish and if I start to have an allergy attack when I am doing chores around the house I can always retreat to the safety of my home office for some relief. These things are great and I plan to buy another one for my grandson to help him with some respiratory problems he is having.

This seems to be working. It is very loud, like a medium sized fan when it is turned to 2 or 3. I was happy to see I can turn off all the operating lights so the room is dark with out those mother ship lights gleaming in the corner of the room.   It will dry out your space, so be aware of that if you wake up with a dry nasal passage. For me, this is a good thing. Since moving to this house, I've had non stop allergies that turn into low grade sickness and nonstop runny nose with a cough. I can tell it's because of the air quality and mold. My allergies get kicked up when it snows and rains from mold and little critters making their way inside the walls and sometimes in the house for my 2 giant cats to play with. Also, there is a fog of exhaust from all of the house's heating systems that I can smell in my hair when coming in from walking my dog in the morning.   I keep the house very minimalist and clean, but there is only so much you can do with a bi-level (meaning half is in the ground as a semi-basement with the heating equipment inside the house). I would wake up in so much pain from pressure and blocked sinuses and sneezing. My dog and cats even had problems. They all snored and one kitty would get a weepy eye when allergens were high. We are a fairly "Green Family", meaning we eat whole, organic, non-processed foods and we don't use any pesticides around the house or "bad" chemicals to clean. Vinegar and natural soap kill as many molds and bacteria as chlorine, FYI, without doing a number on your thyroid.

I really love it , very effective even for a average size living room, I moved into an old bedroom full of junk and smelled bad like dust and rust, It took 2 whole days to get the smell out, but... It worked great to get the dusty smell out, and my throat is clear now instead of me having to cough up flem for hours every morning, so I appreciate this very much, and very affordable.The night light is adjustable, and turns on and off, and is a nice soft green light, donât have a photo yet, but I am very happy with it, light, small, and easy to move, and QUIET! most importantly of all, practically silent, a small soft soothing white noise only on 2nd and 3rd setting

This little unit is impressive to say the least. Amazing value for your money with all the features that come with the JS FLO, including the App that allows you to set any an operating schedule however you want. It is so versatile. And performance wise, I'm extremely satisfied. I placed the unit in different rooms to do some before and after results, and the difference is noticeable within 15-20 minutes. This is some of the best money I have spent in a long time. I will be using this unit mostly in my bedroom where 2 cats like to sleep! The noise is barely noticeable which is definitely one of the best features. 

Overall, this air purifier works wonders considering its compact size, has great features  and is worth every penny. I am a very happy customer

It should be noted that the owners manual that comes with the product says that it is intended for use in small to medium spaces. I put it in a bedroom with area of about 180-200 sq ft, and the air has become noticeably fresher and cleaner soon after I started the purifier. It is quiet enough that you can sleep with it when it runs at low speed; at maximum speed it makes some noise from the fan, but you can't hear the motor. Overall, a great device, we are very pleased with it. In fact, so pleased, that we intend to buy another one and put it in another bedroom!

Got this air purifier 2 weeks ago and immediately plugged it in. After about an hour, i noticed a weird smell and thought my unit was defective. Contacted support and found out there's actually plastic wrapping for the filter and I didnt take it out and it was causing the weird smell...haha  Once i took off the plastic wrapping, the smell was gone and it worked great

We started using the purifier right away and noticed that our air quality is 100% better.  We have a dog and it really helps to clear the air of her dander!

The fan started making a weird sound and they sent a replacement unit right away!  Great customer service!

If you're looking to filter the air of smaller spaces, I highly recommend this air purifier product! It gives a slight cooling effect on warmer days too. The LED lights are green, although I am not so sensitive to light or turbine sound during sleep I am able to keep it turned on all night. You can set it on for 2, 4 or 8 hours and at 3 speed options which is great, if you want to reduce the noise. It's better than a fan!
It does the job like all my past air purifier. I really bought it for the design. For the price I paid, it's not bad. And their filter is not too bad and available on their website.

I got this because of my severe dust mite allergy. I was skeptical because the prices vary so greatly with air purifiers so I was assuming I wouldnât feel much difference. Iâve never been so glad to be wrong. Iâve used the purifier every night & have not had 1 allergy day. This is a huge deal because I usually had 1 every week that was so severe I would be drugged up on benedryl & still sneezing my head off. This purifier gave me my allergy free life back... thus far; hoping it last through next pollen season!

Cleans air effectively, room smells fresher, built quality feels decent, quiet enough on low mode so it doesn't disturb me when I sleep, looks great, and cheap replacement filters. 

Wish there is a black version which would fit into my home decor more.

This thing works great for small spaces. We smoke and have 2 dogs and a ferret,so things can get funky pretty quick. I've been using this for months and I think I have a good idea what it can and can't do- what it can do is obliterate smoke,dust and general funkiness for a small or medium room and it can do it relatively quietly and relatively cheaply. The filters last a decent amount of time,over 6 months each depending on how often it's on and on what setting,and are pretty affordable- and it doesn't keep either of us up at night. What it can't do is handle a whole house or whole floor,provide any real air flow,or cool a room. Overall I'm very pleased and would recommend it to any indoor smokers or pet owners.

Bought it to put in the laundry room because the layout of our home meant that that room just happened to be the only other logical place we could stick a spare litter box. Problem is, the laundry room is connected to the kitchen and who wants to EVER smell litter box odor in their kitchen?? Problem solved! And as an added bonus, the kitchen itself even seems fresher. Kudos to this little machine for working even harder then we asked it to! Super easy to set up, very quiet, long cord, looks nice and above all else-- IT WORKS!  Will be buying another for our bathroom soon!

So...we adopted some cats recently. Kind of on accident. My husband is pretty badly allergic. Along with trying out some new medicine per his doctor, we bought this because I've heard that they help a great deal for people with allergies. It's been two months now, and things are going very well. He has minimal allergy issues, but cats aren't his only allergy. While there are many factors involved here, I feel that this purifier has helped greatly.

Honestly thought i would hate the light...but i love it as a mood light. I also found out you can turn the light off.  The machine is quiet enough and saved my lungs from a lot of grossness from my smoking neighbor.

As I cooked more these days, our small apartment is filled with different cooking smells. Upon request from my wife, I got this unit to run along side me when I cook. 

She says it really does help alleviate most of the heavy smell. I think it help help with the smoke when I pan fry stuff. 

As a plus side, the unit is very sleek and small that it doesn't take up much space on the counter. Now thinking of using it for the bedroom too...

We bought this for our home office because that is where we keep our cat's litter box. We had been having problems in that room with litter box odors and that gross feeling of inhaling the dust from the litter and read that an air purifier might help with those problems. After just a day, the JS FLO air purifier has made a huge difference! It actually smells fresh in our office again and we don't feel the need to constantly have our windows open.  One thing to note: the device is a bit bigger than I was expecting. It is about as big around as a desktop PC tower, but isn't as long. This wasn't a huge deal for us because we were just planning on putting it in the corner anyway.   All in all, we're very happy with it!

We moved into and apartment and our next door neighbor smokes. I have asthma and my husband or I neither one can stand the smell of smoke. We don't care if people smoke, we would just rather not have it in our home. We have tried plug-ins, wax warmers which would help some, but it was still very noticeable at times. We love our apartment and didn't want to move, so we decided from the reviews to try th JS FLO Purifier. What a blessing? We plugged it in and put it in what we thought was the problem area and from day one we have been smoke-smell free. We keep it on fan speed 2 and if we smell a hint of smoke we crank it up to 3 and the air is cleared up almost instantly. It is quiet, the perfect size and affordable. So glad we made the purchase!

Works beautifully. High quality digital unit that is quiet on low and medium settings-- and could be terrific "white noise" at night on the highest setting. I'm impressed by this unit and it's perfect for my studio apartment.   Please note-- I didn't realize that air purifiers (at least ones that really work!) do dry out the air. It's inevitable. I'll likely buy a small humidifier to try to counteract that, but in the meantime the subtle cat odors are gone and I recommend this item to anyone.

I never understood the benefit of air purifiers in addition to plants until this year. It has been a bad fire season this year, and I was having a hard time to breathe inside. So I thought I would try an air purifier.  I loved the look of this product so i bought one.  It took a few hours (high ceilings) but it did clear out the smoke. Because of its size, I move it from room to room with me throughout my day. I am looking forward to seeing how it helps with my allergies in the coming months but I have high hopes.

Not too loud and made a difference almost immediately. Granted my wife and I do not have the biggest bedroom this little air purifier works so well we both sleep better and breath better. the first 3 nights with this thing were great and they only get better. The little green light is pretty cool.  Level 1 - Very quiet does a good job Level 2 - Normal noise level for one of these Level 3 - You can definitely hear this thing going. (Probably couldn't sleep with it on 3 unless you like a noticeable white noise)

I recived this a week ago and plugged it in right away. We haven't turned it off (although we do turn off the LED light at night because it's bright). When I walk in my house, I smell nothing, and that's how I know it's working! There's no more dog smell or even stale air, unopened window smell. Just nothing...and I absolutely love it! We have an 85 lb lab mix. We love her, but our house was beginning to have that doggy smell that is hard to escape when you have a pet. It's gone and I'm a happy woman!
Unit is bit smaller then I expected, but feels like quality built. Does work as I do feel change is air in my room after turning it on.

It works well, the cord is long enough, two light intensities are good for the night if using it in the bedroom. What I do not like about it is that it is loud. I am very sensitive to sound. Even on level two it is too loud for me to fall asleep with so I turn it on during the day while I am not at home.Maybe it is the cylinder shape that makes it so loud. I want to like it because it does a great job on making the air cleaner, just can't use it while sleeping.

It's been about a month since I purchased it and I'm happy so far. With three fan speed settings, you can adjust the fan noise it makes. Most of the time I don't notice the whirring fan sound. And after only one month, the particulates accumulated inside the filter are already noticeable. I've also noticed less dust in the vacuum cleaner when I clean in that room, so it's doing its job. I have been so satisfied with it I bought a second one.

I actually love this air purifier. I have four large dogs - three of whom INSIST on sleeping on the floor in my room at night. I was amazed at what a difference this purifier made in the first 24 hours and now that I have had it three days no-one would know that I have any dogs that sleep in my room. Fresh is an understatement. I'm going to get a couple of more - my house is large so I am going to get one for the living room and one for the family room.

i just used this overnight and it works great for my bedroom! I have two small dogs and after setting the timer on for 2 hours i could feel the difference in the quality in my bedroom. The purifier is really quiet and i feel like it really circulates the air in the room. It has 3 settings for speed and a timer for 2-4-8 hours which is great if you want to leave this on while you sleep. with an appealing look i dont mind leaving it out on top of my dresser.

We purchased two JS FLO air purifiers. Was a little sceptical. OMG, was I proven wrong. Within days, my husband, son, and myself, noticed we were not sneezing in the morning. We cannot wait to see the long term benefits. They only negative I can say is, WHY DID WE WAIT SO LONG TO PURCHASE THESE.

This has all the signs of a high quality made product. Yes it's plastic, but it's not flimsy. Everything fits together with a level of precision found in high quality electronics. Highly confident this will last a long time. Appreciate the quiet operation, and light weight.

I was hoping to use this air purifier for my studio apartment of about 800 sqft, but this unit doesnt seem powerful enough to handle a room of that size. I tried it in the bathroom and it works great, so im assuming this is good for smaller rooms like bedrooms or bathrooms.

Pretty quiet. Improved sleep quality a lot. Power light isn't as bright as some complaints would lead you to believe. Night light is also pretty dim even on high. Just enough to keep from stubbing your toes. :) Very pleased with the device after about 30 days of use.

I am pregnant and smells have been sending me over the edge! Bought this for our bedroom and it smells noticably clean and fresh. Living in an older home with lots of offensive smells. Also get cooking odors that travel down the hall. Will purchase more for other rooms!

I purchased this for my daughter as she has mild asthma which causes heavy breathing from day to day. After using it in her room the past weeks, she told me that she felt better, alot better. Especially going to sleep at night. Wonderful product. Very happy with it.

So far so good. I have noticed a difference using this air filter. The air seems cleaner and smells better if that makes sense. It is some what loud when set on high. As it sounds like a fan blowing lol. Which we like in our house as it is our white noise.

Whenever my room starts to get musty, especially with my 50 lb basset hound who can get really ripe,I turn this guy on and it almost instantly feels fresher and the air feels cleaner. I will probably get two or three more to put in every room in my place!

Bought it since Sept last year. App has been consistent and unit works great. 

One tip is to set the schedule for on offs for everyday of the week, this way you can maximize your filter life. 

Recently, bought another for my mom. It's a good product.

fits anywhere,The FLO is a great fit for my apartment. Depending on events such as parties or balcony BBQ,i move this around to the desired place. It looks great anywhere and you can really feel the difference. The cord is only about 5-6 feet though.

I love this air filter. Currently it is in my bedroom and i noticed within a few hours the air quality was already better. Felt like I had opened the windows and it was so refreshing. I have had it for a few months now and it is still working well.

As I read reviews and decided to buy it. Not bad acutely. Especially when the ac or heat running we need some air to be in the room   this item is good. Gives air so I don't feel I'm in a box no air . I'm glad that I bought it .so far so good.

As an owner of labrador retriever that goes in and out of the house everyday, he brings in a ton of dust! my allergies goes bonkers time to time. I got this and put it by his bed, and it definitely help clears up the air when he moves about.

The unit is great in that it operates without really needing you to do anything. It's been about 6 months of continuous running and i finally got the notification to get a replacement filter. Overall pretty happy with this purchase.

This thing is small but works like itâs huge!! I just replaced my filter after 3 months. I have 4 cats and hardwood floors so my allergies were crazy. Within a few weeks I noticed much less cat hair and breathing much better.

Fantastic filter. We have it in the laundry room where 2 cat litter boxes are and it keeps it nicely odour free for the most part. Fan is not too loud, and has been running constantly for the past 4 months without any issues.

I bought this to run at night in my bedroom, and after only a year of use (and running only ever on low) it started making a rattling noise. It's quite distracting, to the point where I don't even want to use it anymore...

We had stinky pet odors in a room and this product really helped. It also helps in my sonâs room (age 1) with dirty diaper smell. As a side note, it also substitutes as a sound machine to help my son sleep.
I had been looking at a number of different air purifiers. This one is super quiet, sleek, and works great. The filters are easy to access and work great. I saw results almost immediately.
love this thing. works well and quiet at the same time. I use this in my bedroom and basically have this running 24/7 since i cant live without this anymore. the air is just so crisp now
Noticeably fresher air within first night of using! I have it in my baby's nursery and it works great. We live in a very old house and it gets musty. This is a game changer!
Compared to my dyson, its much cheaper, which is great. I found it to be a little loud on max settings though. I usually keep it on the lowest setting to minimize sound.
Compared to my dyson, its much cheaper, which is great. I found it to be a little loud on max settings though. I usually keep it on the lowest setting to minimize sound.
For some reason, I sleep much better at night now with this air purifier running in the background. I think it does make a big difference in the air quality in the room.
One of the most well destined air purifier that I happen to run across. It's not that expensive so I decided to give it a try. It is actually not bad, and great looking!

I purchased this air purifier after adopting 2 cats. I have placed it next to the litter box and it works great!! It obviously isn't a miracle worker, meaning if your litter box is dirty it will smell, but it removes all of those lingering odors. I have also just noticed a general improvement to the air quality in that area of the house. I will note that I have only had it for about 2 weeks, but do notice differences after plugging in for a few hours.

I'm almost embarrassed to write this review. For the first 3 days after receiving this, I didn't know there was a protective film cover for the filter...so i had it turned on and it was making that weird noise and wasnt cleaning the air properly...talk about embarrassing... anyhoooo, after removing the protective film, the air purifier worked perfectly and I then noticed the difference the other reviewers were talking about...ha ha

I can tell a noticeable difference on days I run this and days I don't run it. Considering the cost vs. some other purifiers I have had, this product is a must buy when its on sale. The one I have in my bedroom started to make a rattling noise after several months. I emailed customer service and they area going to send me a replacement model for free! This company has great customer service and you can tell they stand by their product.

Living in an older house and having pets, I was struggling to keep the dust/aerogens at a minimum. After doing a bit of research I settled on this little JS FLO purifier for my master suite. What a difference! After the first week of running it just at night, I peeked at the filter...and I was SHOCKED at what this little machine caught from the lower-dander area. I would recommend this to anyone with pets for smaller (300sq/ft) rooms.

If you're looking to filter the air of smaller spaces, I highly recommend this air purifier product! It gives a slight cooling effect on warmer days too. The LED lights are green, although I am not so sensitive to light or turbine sound during sleep I am able to keep it turned on all night. You can set it on for 2, 4 or 8 hours and at 3 speed options which is great, if you want to reduce the noise. It's better than a fan!

This is a nice compact unit for one room. I noticed the difference in the air quality the first day. We keep it on high ( setting 2 or 3 ) during the day and low (1) at night. I would recommend this product for a child's room, bedroom, or living room for those that are allergic to dust and have sensitivity to pollen. The night-light hasn't been yet used often, but it is quite convenient with two settings.

I bought this this air filter to help clean the air in my apartment, which the previous owner had multiple cats and a dog. It worked so well that my mom took it for herself! So I bought a second one. However the 2nd air purifier is a bit noiser than the first I got and Iâm not sure why. First one was nearly silent, the second one rattles even on the lowest setting. Other than that this air purifier is AMAZING!

This air purifier has really changed my life. I suffer from allergies and I have been using this at night when I sleep. I wake up feeling more refreshed and less congested. I can tell a difference in the air when I wake up. It is the perfect size and I like the different settings. It isn't loud, I actually find it very peaceful. I wish I had one for every room and I highly recommend this product.

I received my air purifier about a couple of weeks ago and I notice the air quality difference in the area that I'm in. I have it located in my living room and I could tell that it's reducing the dust particles and I could inhale freshness. I love how modern it looks compared to my other one & it's also on the quiet side . I also enjoy the soothing green light that is built into it.

The air is fresher in my condo, which is probably partly due to this purifier. What I really love is how compact and efficient and well engineered this machine is. I love how quiet it is on the lowest setting and how you can turn off all the lights for a really dark bedroom. I don't know how to measure the air quality but I'm thinking the machine is doing a great job with that also.

After using FLO, I have noticed is that the air actually tastes fresh. I believe this is because of the continuous circulation. I also feel like I'm waking up slightly more rested and energized but I am not sure if that is just the placebo affect. I occasionally like opening up the back panel to see all the nasty particles the filter has collected so far and am glad it is not in my lungs.

We absolutely love this product! My daughter has asthma and would cough through the night. It's now been 2 weeks since we placed the FLO in her room and her coughing fits are well under control! Her room just feels clean as soon as we walk in. Also love the sleek and stylish look. The adjustable green light is an added bonus which puts out a warm glow. We'll be be buying 2 more.

I have definitely noticed a difference in the air quality in the room! The air just feels cleaner, and I'm not sneezing or coughing as much. For example, I cleaned my room in the morning and it was FULL of dust... by that evening, I did not have any allergy issues. I will say that this is only big enough for one room. I have it in my bedroom, and I keep the door shut.

Only had these turned on for 2 days and can already breathe better. I have one next to my bed, the other in my husband's office. They are quiet and work very well. The only drawback is the nightlight is really a bit too bright. I turned it off. 3 speeds, 2 settings of the nightlight, plus off. Easy touchpad type controls. It's not pretty but it is efficient!

The2018 fires in BC really affected the air quality in my home. (Fortunately, that was all I had to deal with from the fires!) I was having trouble breathing, even inside, so I bought two of these air filters to clear up the air. They work like a dream (granted, I've only had them for about a month at the time). I could tell immediately the air quality was better. I stopped waking up with a sore throat and didn't feel as sick -- no more headaches and slight nausea.  The air filters are pretty quiet. After the initial medium blast setting, I put them on low. I run them continuously and I've stopped hearing the noise -- not that there is much to hear to begin with, particularly on the lowest setting.  My only "complaint" is the air filter also seems to suck a lot of the moisture out of the air. My nose has been dry since I started using the air filters. So maybe now I need a humidifier.... Ah well....

We needed an air purifier for our basement and to help reduce allergens in the air. My mother has allergies to animal dander and dust; this purifier helped keep her area in the basement feeling fresh and "cleaner." The price is comparable to other air purifiers on the market but the design is a lot sexier. It emits a quiet hum - very slight white noise.

I bought this because the quality of the air in the house is bad. Reading the reviews and purchasing this was the best thing for my problem. Small, elegant and mostly very efficient! The air is clean. No pet dander, hair, dust and much more were captured in my first filter. Grqb this for a basic room and the filter will cost you $10 a month and totaly worth it

Good product, seems to do the job. There is one major con though. This unit does not seem to move enough air. The CFM (that's cubic feet per minute) could be higher for my liking. I have a similar unit from another manufacturer, similar style and dimensions, that moves much more air. Though for the price the FLO is the best deal going as well as aesthetic.

My boyfriend has asthma to the point where he goes through a full inhaler about every four weeks. He is on no other meds and he just canât breathe most of the time. Itâs spring time now so the pollen is everywhere and we also just got two cats. We have had the cats about three weeks and his breathing got so bad he went through a full inhaler in about 15 days. He had this awful cough and the doctor told us we had to get rid of the cats. But I refuse. So I bought this to try to help. Without daily vacuuming and dusting, placing this in our bedroom for five days with a box fan circulating the air has helped his coughing drastically, and he is using his inhaler back to normal. Iâm pretty amazed. Iâm going to buy another one for his gaming room where he spends most of his time and I think this has changed my life. I love my cats and I love my boyfriend so I refuse to get rid of either. So this has absolutely worked for us.

What an amazing attractive little air purifier. I have used air purifiers for years and this is the most attractive and easy to insert/change the filters. The only draw back is they are so powerful that on high, it creates some noise even on floors with rugs and good quality rug pad....not a huge deal though, I just turn it off or low when I go to bed.

Just plugged in today. Very easy to set up. Placed in sun room which has been frequented by many cats through the years. Has been running now for about 4 hours. Been a long time since the room has not smelled. Does not smell now! Excellent product. Thinking of getting a larger model to cover the entire house. MAKE A LARGER MODEL PLZ

I have pet rats and they STINK sooooo badly when I don't clean them after two days. One day I was sick and decided to just move the purifier into the same room as the rats. Every other day,even when they rats have been freshly cleaned,there's always a little stink. With the purifier in there,I smelled NOTHING.

Impressed with construction quality. Fit and finish are very nice. Bought it during the fire season this year do to the immense amount of smoke we have been forced to deal with. We use it in the bedroom at night. It did make a noticeable difference. My only complaint is it is a little noisy at higher levels.

BC has poor air quality due to the fires in the Summers. Fortunately for me this unit is great. I purchased this for my girlfriend because she would tell me that the smoke would burn her eyes and lungs. With this it cleared the air right up and she is very greatful that this provided her with breathable air

Shipment was very prompt, and setup was fast and flawless. The unit works as advertised with no problems, the fan noise is quite low on the lower setting (which is all we need at this time). I highly recommend this air purifier, and most likely will order a second unit for the upstairs area of the house.
